title: DevDiscovery AI - Smart Open Source Project Discovery
description: AI-powered platform for discovering and evaluating open-source projects across multiple platforms. Features smart analysis, advanced filtering, and comprehensive project metrics.
keywords: open-source, project-discovery, developer-tools, typescript, react, ai, project-analysis, developer-experience, project-metrics, code-quality, package-manager, github-api, gitlab-api, project-health, developer-productivity
